import React, {Fragment} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Moment from 'react-moment' const Experience = ({experience}) => { const displayDetails = experience.map((exp) => { {exp.company} {exp.title} {exp.from} - {exp.to === null ? ('Today') : ({exp.from})} }) return (

Experience Credentials

{displayDetails}
Company Title Years
) } Experience.propTypes = { } export default Experience
